channel.title: Ipod on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Ipod on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: stupid electronics...
item.description: so I keep breaking my electronics. I just toasted my ipod. stupid ghetto firewire cards. stupid clie.. stupid tivo. I hate you all.. I am tired. i need to get lunch.

item.title: Heart i choke
item.description: So today I am supra busy at work. I have to do allll of this stuff that generally would be quite annoying.. hoever it is leading to a “better time” and will make work a lot more bareable - so I guess that is ‘ok.’ Umm yea. I am eating an artichoke, chicken, mushroom rap.. listening to horrible trance and being bombarded with hotornot entries from all directions. what fun. i am really excited to get my new ipod.
